p: Effect of methanol extract of Z. armatum stem bark (ZAB) and isolated total alkaloid fraction (ZABA) on pyrexia induced body temperature in mice is presented in Table 2. It was noted that ZAB at all doses caused less significant (p < 0.05) decrease of body temperature in mice up to 5 h of extract administration as compared to ZAF and ZAL. Similarly, ZABA showed less significant (p < 0.05) lowering of rectal temperature in mice after 5 h.
